Package io.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLBatchExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JooqDSLProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Jooqx, JooqxBase<S>, JooqxBatchExecutor, JooqxConn, JooqxTx, LegacyJooqx, LegacyJooqxTx, io.zero88.jooqx.LegacySQLImpl.LegacyInternal<S>, SQLExecutor<S,​B,​PQ,​RS,​RC>
    public interface SQLBatchExecutor
extends JooqDSLProvider
    Represents for a batch executor that executes batch SQL command
